RealSteelerWorker, be careful for what you wish for, our BOF has TWO big tummies that would love to make Western Omelets out of those little tender western mills. The Polish Coke is bought in volume, and the EU is bankrupt, so they are more then delighted to send us all we want at below the high Spot prices the western mills are locked into. And HELLO - SP has one of the largest and most productive Sintering Plants in the world, so SP has so many PELLETS that we could send the western mills some on one of our empty "Scrap Express" trains heading to your to where the sun sets.
Thanks for the book offer, we have several copies in the Main Office Library, George just checked out a copy.
Dr. Walter Phd. BS
